Anggota Dewas KPK Dilantik Desember, Mahfud: Saya Tak Beri Nama
05 Nov 2019, 17:15 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) bakal melantik anggota Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK bersamaan dengan komisioner KPK baru pada Desember mendatang. Menko Polhukam Mahfud Md mengatakan anggota Dewas untuk pertama kalinya memang langsung ditunjuk Jokowi tanpa Pansel.
"Menurut UU, pertama kali itu Dewan Pengawas dipilih oleh Presiden. Paling lambat bersamaan dengan pelantikan komisioner yang baru KPK," kata Mahfud di Kemenko Polhukam, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Dia mengaku tak terlibat proses pemilihan karena hal tersebut merupakan kewenangan Jokowi selaku presiden. Dia juga mengatakan tak memberikan nama ke Jokowi.
"Nggak (terlibat), nggak. Saya juga nggak memberi nama," ucap Mahfud.
Sebelumnya, Juru Bicara Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi), Fadjroel Rachman, mengatakan Dewas KPK akan diambil dari unsur hukum dan nonhukum. Fadjroel membuka peluang adanya pensiunan penegak hukum yang masuk menjadi Dewas.
"Sangat dimungkinkan, kalau pensiun boleh dong masuk di dalamnya. Tentu yang tidak aktif kan," kata Fadjroel di Kompleks Istana Kepresidenan, Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11).

KPK Dewas Member Inaugurated in December, Mahfud: I Didn't Give a Name
05 Nov 2019, 17:15 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) will inaugurate members of the KPK Supervisory Board (Dewas) together with new KPK commissioners in December. The Coordinating Minister for Politics and Security Mahfud Md said that for the first time Dewas members were immediately appointed by Jokowi without Pansel.
"According to the Act, the Supervisory Board was elected by the President for the first time. At the latest along with the inauguration of the new commissioner of the KPK," said Mahfud at the Coordinating Ministry for Politics and Security, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
He claimed not to have been involved in the election process because it was Jokowi's authority as president. He also said not to give a name to Jokowi.
"No (involved), no. I also didn't give a name," said Mahfud.
Earlier, Presidential Spokesman Joko Widodo (Jokowi), Fadjroel Rachman, said Dewas KPK would be taken from legal and non-legal elements. Fadjroel opened the opportunity for retired law enforcers to become Dewas.
"It is very possible, if you retire, please enter it. Of course, those who are not active," said Fadjroel at the Presidential Palace Complex, Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5).
